sqlMap.select: select count(*) from t2_version where v_no in '$clientVersion$' and v_state='00A'
select count(*) from t2_version where v_no in '$clientVersion$' and package_name = '$package_name$' and v_state='00A'

select v_no, v_down, v_date, v_state from (select v_no, v_down, v_date, v_state from t2_version where 1=1 and v_state='00A'
and package_name = '$package_name$'
order by v_date desc,v_no desc) where rownum = 1

select u.user_id, u.phone_number, u.user_name, u.org_id, u.org_name, u.pos_org_id, u.pos_org_name, u.imei, u.imsi, u.pattern_code, u.status, u.login_type, u.password, u.user_acct from t2_user u where u.status = '00A'
and u.pattern_code='$pattern_code$'
and u.user_acct='$user_acct$'
and u.password='$password$'
and u.package_name = '$package_name$'
sqlMap.insert: insert into T2_LOGON ( USER_ACCT, USER_PWD, PATTERN_CODE, LOGDATE, RESULT ) values( '$user_acct$', '$password$', '$pattern_code$', sysdate, '$result$' )

insert into T2_REGIST_CHECK_LOG ( ID, PHONE_NUMBER, USER_NAME, IMEI, IMSI, SYSTEMVERSION, CLIENTVERSION, RESULT, POS_ORG_ID, USER_ACCT, LOGDATE, PACKAGE_NAME ) values( '$id$', '$phone_number$', '$user_name$', '$imeiCode$', '$imsiCode$', '$systemVersion$', '$clientVersion$', '$result$', '$posOrgId$', '$phone_number$', sysdate, '$pakname$' )
sqlMap.update: update T2_REGIST_CHECK_LOG set user_name='$user_name$', IMEI='$imeiCode$', IMSI='$imsiCode$', SYSTEMVERSION='$systemVersion$', CLIENTVERSION='$clientVersion$' where phone_number='$phone_number$'
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from T2_REGIST_CHECK_LOG where phone_number='$phone_number$'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T2_USER WHERE phone_number='$phone_number$'
sqlMap.update: update t2_user set password='$newPassword$' where user_id='$user_id$'
update t2_user set pattern_code='$newPassword$' where user_id='$user_id$'
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from T2_REGIST_CHECK_LOG where result = '1' and imsi='$imsiCode$' and imei='$imeiCode$'
select count(*) from dual

select p2.rep_id, p3.rep_name, p3.rep_date_sql max_date, p3.data_source_id data_source from t2_user_role p1, t2_role_home_page p2, t2_home_page p3 where p1.user_id = '$user_id$' and p1.role_id = p2.role_id and p2.rep_id=p3.rep_id order by rep_pos
select rep_id, rep_name, rep_sql, rep_head_sql, rep_date_sql, rep_goin_sql, rep_desc, rep_pos, data_source_id data_source from t2_home_page where rep_id = '$rep_id$'
$sql$
$sql$
$sql$

select t.menu_id, t.menu_name, t.super_menu, t.menu_lvl, t.menu_pic_name, t.menu_pos, t.menu_style, t.isnew, t.rep_id, t.tab_id from t2_menu t, t2_user_menu s where t.menu_state='00A' and t.menu_id = s.menu_id
and s.user_id='$user_id$'
and t.super_menu='$super_menu$'
and t.tab_id='$tab_id$'
order by t.menu_pos

select p1.rep_id, p2.rep_name, p2.rep_date_sql max_date, p2.data_source_id data_source from t2_menu p1, t2_home_page p2 where p1.rep_id=p2.rep_id and p1.super_menu = '$parentId$'
and p1.tab_id='$tab_id$'
order by p1.menu_pos
select mode_id from T2_UPDATE_MODE
select tips_date,tips_sql from T2_FIRST_TIPS
select userd_name menu_id, used_view data_date, disp_view from T2_APK_PUSH t where T.USERD_NAME='APK_PUSH_DATE' and status='Enabled'
select rep_sql, rep_date_sql from t2_home_page t where t.rep_desc='量化薪酬' and rep_name='$rep_name$'
$sql$
$sql$

select order_id, rep_id, rep_name, statis_date, org_id, org_name, ind_c1, ind_c2, ind_c3, ind_c4, ind_c5, ind_c6, ind_c7, ind_c8, ind_c9, ind_c10, ind_c11, ind_c12 from t2_graphical_analysis where 1=1
and order_id='$order_id$'
and statis_date='$statis_date$'
and org_id='$org_id$'

select s.user_id, s.chart_id, s.tab_id, t.chart_name, t.chart_png, t.pos from t2_home_chart t, t2_chart_customization s where t.chart_id=s.chart_id
and s.user_id='$userId$'
order by t.pos

select DIM_SQL,CHART_DATA_SQL, ALARM_SQL,CHART_TITLE_SQL,CHART_CONDITION_SQL from t2_chart_config t where 1=1
and chart_id='$chartId$'
and dim_id='$dimId$'
$sql$
$sql$
$sql$

select t.chart_type from t2_chart_config t where 1=1
and t.chart_id='$chartId$'
and t.dim_id='$dimId$'

select distinct t.market_id, t.market_name, t.is_class from t2_market_list t where sysdate between begin_date and end_date and (t.coun_manager_id='$user_id$' or t.chnl_manager_id='$user_id$') order by t.market_id

select t.serv_number, /*号码*/ t.user_name,/*姓名*/ t.brand_name,/*品牌*/ t.marketing_case_name,/*营销案*/ t.credit_name,/*信誉度等级*/ t.net_dur,/*网龄*/ t.usim_flag,/*是否USIM卡*/ TO_CHAR(t.arpu, 'FM99990.00') arpu,/*ARPU*/ TO_CHAR(t.call_dur, 'FM99990.00') call_dur,/*通话时长*/ TO_CHAR(t.call_cnt, 'FM99990.00') call_cnt,/*通话次数*/ TO_CHAR(t.flux_2g, 'FM99990.00') flux_2g,/*2G流量*/ TO_CHAR(t.flux_3g, 'FM99990.00') flux_3g,/*3G流量*/ TO_CHAR(t.flux_4g, 'FM99990.00') flux_4g,/*4G流量*/ t.point_cnt,/*积分余额*/ t.campseg_content, /*营销用语*/ t.detain_info_cur /*维系内容*/ from t2_market_list t where (t.coun_manager_id = '$user_id$' or t.chnl_manager_id = '$user_id$') and t.deal_flag = 2
and t.class_id = '$class_id$'
and t.market_id= '$market_id$' order by t.cur_mon_detain_times desc

select t.market_id, /*营销活动id*/ t.market_name,/*营销活动名称*/ to_char(sum(case when t.deal_flag = 1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(1)*100.00,'FM99990.00')||'%' finish_rate/*当前完成情况*/ from t2_market_list t where sysdate between begin_date and end_date and (t.coun_manager_id='$user_id$' or t.chnl_manager_id='$user_id$') group by t.market_id, t.market_name order by t.market_id

select t.serv_number, /*号码*/ t.user_name,/*姓名*/ t.brand_name,/*品牌*/ t.marketing_case_name,/*营销案*/ t.credit_name,/*信誉度等级*/ t.net_dur,/*网龄*/ t.usim_flag,/*是否USIM卡*/ TO_CHAR(t.arpu, 'FM99990.00') arpu,/*ARPU*/ TO_CHAR(t.call_dur, 'FM99990.00') call_dur,/*通话时长*/ TO_CHAR(t.call_cnt, 'FM99990.00') call_cnt,/*通话次数*/ TO_CHAR(t.flux_2g, 'FM99990.00') flux_2g,/*2G流量*/ TO_CHAR(t.flux_3g, 'FM99990.00') flux_3g,/*3G流量*/ TO_CHAR(t.flux_4g, 'FM99990.00') flux_4g,/*4G流量*/ t.point_cnt,/*积分余额*/ t.campseg_content, /*营销用语*/ to_char(s.exec_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') exec_time,/*营销时间*/ s.line_info,/*营销方式*/ s.exec_detail /*营销备注*/ from t2_market_list t,t2_market_exec s where t.market_id=s.market_id and t.serv_number=s.serv_number and (t.coun_manager_id = '$user_id$' or t.chnl_manager_id = '$user_id$') and t.deal_flag = 1 and t.market_id='$market_id$' and 1 = 1 order by t.cur_mon_detain_times desc
select t.class_id, t.class_name from t2_market_class t where t.market_id = '$market_id$'
